notes.text: MB – received EFT confirmation of deposit for broker fee on December 12

Deal submitted to VWR Capital Corp. - M122516974 - Submission Note: Selected Product: 2nd Mortgage Residential Closed
Purpose: 2nd mortgage. Client wishes to take out equity for investment purposes.
He wants the funds to explore a future purchase, but has no property in mind yet.
 
Income/Employment: Client is a full time delivery driver, and income is confirmed through T4s. He's been in this industry for about 3 years.
 
Credit Score: Client's score is 572. Score is bruised due to miscommunication while switching mortgage lenders. However, all other payment history is great.
 
Exit Strategy: Client will refinance in about a year, adding his wife and brother-in-law on title.
 
At 75% LTV, GDS and TDS acceptable. 
All ratios in line.
 
Please contact stephanie@bluepearlmortgage.ca or call 604.372.2764 for any questions. 
Thank you!
